query: SHOW CREATE TABLE drinks; SHOW CREATE TABLE body_metrics; SHOW CREATE TABLE nutrition_goals;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Acm1QzHQhQUgLe.35139a5d2a11 --database CVoYWTwV8QMMBSnZsHHM3q --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE drinks; SHOW CREATE TABLE body_metrics; SHOW CREATE TABLE nutrition_goals;
messages: CONSTRAINT `drinks_clientId_clients_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`clientId`) REFERENCES `CVoYWTwV8QMMBSnZsHHM3q`.`clients` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
CONSTRAINT `drinks_mealId_meals_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`mealId`) REFERENCES `CVoYWTwV8QMMBSnZsHHM3q`.`meals` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION
CONSTRAINT `body_metrics_clientId_clients_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`clientId`) REFERENCES `CVoYWTwV8QMMBSnZsHHM3q`.`clients` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION
`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
CONSTRAINT `nutrition_goals_clientId_clients_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`clientId`) REFERENCES `CVoYWTwV8QMMBSnZsHHM3q`.`clients` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION
stdout:
Table	Create Table
drinks	CREATE TABLE `drinks` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `clientId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `drinkType` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `volumeMl` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `notes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `loggedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `calories` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `protein` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `fat` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `carbs` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `fibre` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `mealId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `drinks_clientId_clients_id_fk` (`clientId`),
  KEY `drinks_mealId_meals_id_fk` (`mealId`),
  CONSTRAINT `drinks_clientId_clients_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`clientId`) REFERENCES `CVoYWTwV8QMMBSnZsHHM3q`.`clients` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `drinks_mealId_meals_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`mealId`) REFERENCES `CVoYWTwV8QMMBSnZsHHM3q`.`meals` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=1710001
Table	Create Table
body_metrics	CREATE TABLE `body_metrics` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `clientId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `weight` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `hydration` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `notes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `recordedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `body_metrics_clientId_clients_id_fk` (`clientId`),
  CONSTRAINT `body_metrics_clientId_clients_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`clientId`) REFERENCES `CVoYWTwV8QMMBSnZsHHM3q`.`clients` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=120001
Table	Create Table
nutrition_goals	CREATE TABLE `nutrition_goals` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `clientId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `caloriesTarget` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '2000',
  `proteinTarget` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '150',
  `fatTarget` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '65',
  `carbsTarget` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '250',
  `fibreTarget` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '25',
  `hydrationTarget` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '2000',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `weightTarget` decimal(5,1) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `nutrition_goals_clientId_clients_id_fk` (`clientId`),
  CONSTRAINT `nutrition_goals_clientId_clients_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`clientId`) REFERENCES `CVoYWTwV8QMMBSnZsHHM3q`.`clients` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=570001
